tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have visited for irregular periods.Dr. Bharathi not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment.I have a wonderful experience visiting the center each time, as the staff nurses were always helpful and kind in each of my visits.They ensured I had a smooth follow-up whenever required, as they were available anytime on calls.Initially, I was also fearful that I have irregular periods but, Dr.Bharathi made me overcome the same and treated me very well, and I see good results.I am so glad I choose the clinic and would highly recommend it to anyone.

We are blessed with a baby girl. I would like to specially thank Dr. Bharathi from the bottom of my heart, who has been really kind, humble to me and my wife during her pregnancy period (Specially during the COVID time) and till the delivery. She gave one of the Best IVF treatment who not only heal the patient medically but with the personal touch as well. She went beyond her limits and gave her best (During odd hours too) till the delivery.
I certainly recommend each expecting parents to choose her as their IVF Treatment as well.

Very Humble towards to patients.. Answering all the queries without any hesitation.. Also Dr. Bharathi is very friendly and she will not make us scared for anything..  Even though you have big prblm the way she says will be very positive.. And she always says everything is possible.. I'm trusting her for my whole pregnancy and child birth..
